basic_info.description: I'm Kohle Christensen. I've recently received my Software Technology certificate from Ogden-Weber Technical College and am now looking to land a job to continue developing these skills. I'm particularly interested in learning new programming languages, specifically Python, as well as deepening my knowledge in C#. If you wish to contact me, please email me at Nemmisisk205@gmail.com.

projects.title: Goggle Incentive Calculator
projects.description: Capstone project, but I also made it for a supervisor at my old job. It's designed to take production numbers from operators at a ski goggle producer and determine if they did well enough to recieve a bonus incentive. It stores these numbers to a database as well, allowing additional accountibility.

projects.title: Corey's Knick-Knacks'
projects.description: Guided school project. It's an inventory management system and store front. The overall steps were guided by the assignments, but final implementation was left up to me.
